INGEST_FORM.STEP2_SUBHEADER: Use this form to schedule either single or repeating ingests
INGEST_FORM.REPO_DELETED: The previous repository "{{customRepoName}}" has been deleted. You can select another one or enter an URL.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_LOCAL_SOLR: Can not retrieve institutions from Local OGP instance
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_REMOTE_SOLR: Cannot retrieve remote sources from this URL. Please check the URL.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_RETRIEVING_REMOTE_SOURCES: An internal error occurred while retrieving sources from the remote server. Please check the URL.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_REMOTE_GEONETWORK: Cannot retrieve remote sources from this URL. Please check the URL.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_PREDEFINED_GEONETWOR: Cannot retrieve remote sources from the remote server. Please contact the admin.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_CONNECTING_TO_PREDEFINED_SOLR: Cannot retrieve remote sources from the remote server. Please contact the admin.
INGEST_FORM.ERROR_RETRIEVING_PREDEFINED_REMOTE_SOURC: An internal error occurred while retrieving sources from the remote server. Please contact the admin.

MANAGE_INGESTS.UNSCHEDULE_INGEST_HEADER_TOOLTIP: This is the Unschedule Ingest dialog tooltip
MANAGE_INGESTS.UNSCHEDULE_INGEST_CONFIRM_TEXT: You are about to cancel all the scheduled executions of this ingest. Are you sure you want to continue?
MANAGE_INGESTS.STOP_INGEST_HEADER_TOOLTIP: This is the Stop Ingest dialog tooltip
MANAGE_INGESTS.STOP_INGEST_CONFIRM_TEXT: You are about to discard current execution of this ingest. Records that have already been processed will be in OGP. Are you sure you want to cancel execution?
MANAGE_INGESTS.ERROR_INTERRUPTING_INGEST: An error has been found while stopping ingest.
MANAGE_INGESTS.EXCEPTION_INTERRUPTING_INGEST: An exception has been thrown while stopping ingest.
